word:
Chap. 327 - The Enormous Harvest of a Single Act 

     And there came a certain poor widow, and she threw in two mites. . . . And he called unto him his disciples, and saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, . . . they did cast in of their abundance; but she of her want did cast in all that she had, even all her living. Mark 12:42-44.
